review: The only reason I bought the Fire TV Stick was to watch ESPN3 on my HDMI large screen.  You need to be a subscriber to a cable or satellite provider.  The only cable that is available in my area ( LaGrange, GA) is Charter Communications.  Charter cable is not listed as a provider on ESPN3 using Fire TV Stick.  ......I can see ESPN3 on my ipad or window version 7-8 computers. Amazon advertise that Fire TV Stick works with "Watch ESPN" which is true but not with Charter Communications which offers their cable network to 6 million households.  Bottom line.....Amazon Fire TV Stick is worthless to me
